## JsPlumbInstance.removeAllEndpoints() method

Remove every endpoint registered to the given element.  removeAllEndpoints

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAllEndpoints(el: T["E"], recurse?: boolean): JsPlumbInstance;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | T\["E"\] | Element to remove endpoints for. |
|  recurse | boolean | If true, also remove endpoints for elements that are descendants of this element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[JsPlumbInstance](./core.jsplumbinstance)
